transcript:
Customer: This call is now being recorded.
Executive: Hello, Kanchan ma'am, good evening.
Customer: Ji bol rahi hu, bataiye.
Executive: Imran baat kar raha tha main senior manager IndiaMART se, kaisi hain aap?
Customer: Main theek hu, aap bataiye.
Executive: Haan ji ma'am already ek concern open hai ma'am, aath din ho gaya aaj, hai na ma'am? To bataiye ma'am full and final ke kya karna hai, aap bataiye jo bhi aapka decision hoga.
Customer: Abhi mujhe use close nahi karna. Lekin abhi tak ek bhi lead nahi mili. Hmm hmm. Mujhe abhi use close nahi karna, mujhe abhi tak ek bhi genuine lead nahi mili hai.
Hmm hmm. Abhi mujhe last mein jo hai kuch keywords wagera change kiye gaye the, kuch changes karaye gaye the. Uske bavajud bhi mujhe wahi job seekers ki requirement jyada aa rahi hai. Marketing ke liye bhi ek se apply kiya hua hai. Aur jo mujhe ek person mile hue hain Om Om Enterprises karke, unke sath mein ye baat chal rahi hai, unko aaj shaam tak reply karna tha but unhone kuch reply nahi kiya abhi tak.
Executive: To abhi aap kya karna hai, aap bataiye mujhe.
Customer: Ya to aap isko hold rakhiye, ya to aap isko hold rakhiye. Kyunki mere ko maine aapko pehle hi bola tha mujhe thoda do, do chaar din ka, ye week ka time dijiye na ek baar.
Executive: Ma'am already, dekhiye ma'am koi issue nahi, main aapko one week ka time de raha hu ma'am. Aap ek kaam kijiye dekhiye ma'am, aap mera number save kar lijiye, ye mera personal number, matlab office ka number hai ma'am. Imran ji mere paas nahi hai, mere paas number save ho chuke hain. Sabka yahi kehna hota hai baad mein sab kuch. Ma'am, mera baat sun lijiye ma'am, jo cheez main aapko clearly bolta rahunga. Either aap mera number save kar lijiye ye, aapke paas Anchika ka number hai ma'am, theek hai? Within one week ma'am, aap mujhe bata dijiyega agar aapko aage continue karna hoga ma'am, agar aapko lagta hai ki continue kar sakte hain, then hum isko karenge, agar aapko lagta hai nahi mujhe continue nahi karna hai, mujhe refund chahiye, phir uske according main isko process karwayenge ma'am.
Customer: Bolie na.
Executive: Abhi koi bhi client ka agar hamare paas bhi concern open hota hai na. Friday ho gaya, Friday, Saturday do din ka hi to time hai.
Customer: Ma'am koi bhi client ka hamare paas concern open. Ma'am ek cheez main aapko bolu ma'am. Main agar main koi bhi hamare paas concern days hota hai na ma'am, to hamara bhi ek priority hota hai ki three days ka hamara TAT chalta hai ma'am. But already humne onboarding team se bhi baat kiya after that aapke according humne video meeting wagera sari cheeze karwaya ma'am. Aapne mujhse do din ka time manga phir bhi maine aapko do din ka time diya.
Executive: Imran ji, Imran ji, mujhe bataiye, aapke har cheez karne ka ya phir mera is iske aapki membership lene ka main reason kya tha? Mujhe buyleads mile.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm. Chahe aap kitni bhi aap meeting kara lijiye, kitna bhi aap keywords kara lijiye, mujhe sirf ek bhi mujhe sirf ek only single one, mujhe ek bhi potential lead mil jati hai na ki haan ye person mere liye positive hai, hai na? To mujhe koi issue nahi hai. Agar do hafte ke baad bhi mere hath mein ek lead positive nahi hai, to main us cheez ko kya samjhu? Abhi agar is stage pe aap mujhe keh rahe ki ma'am abhi hi close kar do. Main soch rahi hu apne aap ko do din ka aur time de rahi hu, soch rahi hu ki do din mein ho sakta hai jo main Om Enterprises chal rahi hai, ho sakta hai wo de de kuch positive response.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Main ye nahi keh raha hu close karne ka ma'am.
Executive: Ma'am Kanchan ma'am main wo cheez nahi keh raha hu, main keh raha hu ki ek concern hamare paas open hai ma'am, theek hai? Aap mujhe do din baad aap mujhe update karoge ki uske regarding. Uska update yahi hai, uska hi update yahi hai ki aap usme yahi update kijiye na. Ki abhi tak candidate ko abhi tak aapke client ko jo usko usne jis cheez ke liye membership li hai wo nahi mila hai. And she is waiting for the two days more.
Customer: Theek hai, main update kar dunga but agar mujhe do din baad agar mujhe aap personally bata doge ya hum call karke aapka feedback le lenge to wo nahi chalega ma'am aapka? Wo bhi to kahin na kahin chalega na ma'am aapka. To main usko kya keh ke close karwaun? Ki mera concern solve ho gaya hai?
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Main ye cheez nahi keh raha hu ki aapka concern solve ho gaya ma'am, agar concern aapka solve ho gaya hota ma'am to already do din pehle hi aapne mujhe bata diya hota ma'am.
Customer: Close kar diya hota na, to phir aap mujhe bataiye main close kis hisab se karwaun? Kya keh ke karwaun? Ki mera concern close nahi, mera concern abhi tak solve hua nahi hai, meri problem abhi tak as it is hai but aap mera wo close kar do. What should I say?
Executive: To abhi aap kya chahti hain aap bataiye mujhe final ma'am. Maine aapko bata diya.
Executive: Two days more aap time chahiye aapko, do din ka aur time chahiye aapko na? Chaliye theek hai koi issue nahi.
Customer: Aur aapko bata paungi na. Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai koi issue nahi ma'am, main baat kar leta hu.
Customer: Okay ji. Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Has not received genuine buyleads yet.

- Job seekers' requirements are coming more.

- Om Enterprises has not replied yet.



Resolution:

- Executive gave one week time.

- Executive asked to save his number.

- Executive will process refund if not satisfied.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will update after two days.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, membership, keywords
